publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1803.2 Mike Rumbles: Food Security—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1803) in the name of John Scott, insert at end "recognises the role of Scotland’s primary producers in ensuring the long-term capacity and capability of our food supply; and further calls on the Scottish Government to encourage the development of local supply chains through public procurement, address the imbalance in power between the big supermarkets and our food producers, reduce the regulatory burden on farmers, and ensure that our primary producers operate on a level playing field with foreign competitors."
